refnamediv.refpurpose: returns the vector of edge data fields names

listitem.para: a row vector of strings. Each element is a field name of the edges data data structure.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: It is possible to associate data to the edges of a graph. This can be done with the add_edge_data function. the edgedatafields function allows to retreive the field names of these data. A given edge data can be referenced by its field name g.edges.data(field_name).
